sourcesContent:
<template>
   <input type="text" id="header" 
   @keyup.enter="add_item"
   v-model="title" placeholder="请输入你的任务名称，按回车确认">
</template>

<script>


 export default{
    name:'Top',
    data() {
      return {
         title:''

      }
    },
    methods:{
         add_item(){
            alert(this.title)
         }
    }
 }
</script>

<style>
   #header{
      width: 500px;
      height: 50px;
      font-size: 20px;
      
   }
</style>
